name: Block Mechanic
description:
Block Mechanic is a  physics puzzle game, where you combine a selection of blocks of different types to build a vehicle.

If your vehicle makes it to the flag you win! Are you mechanic enough to beat all 5 levels?

Block Mechanic was created in 48 hours by a single person during the Game Makers toolkit Game Jam 2021.

Controls:

mouse left click : drag and drop blocks onto the grid

enter/space : Start simulation

escape/backspace : restart

e/r/arrowkeys : Rotate block

When you win a stage, click Enter to go to the next stage

Made by Johan Grönvall (Zapray)
